attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to bring in equality for all British citizens regardless of sexual orientation with regards to Marriage. This means extending the rights of same sex couples to become legally married as is legal in Canada, Belgium, 5 states of the USA, the Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, Spain and South Africa.
Civil Partnerships should also be open to heterosexual couples who do not necessarily want to get married.

Equal but different is NOT equality.
Love is Love.
